text: Rafi was a Socialist political party in Israel. It was led by David Ben-Gurion and later Shimon Peres. ==History== After Levi Eshkol became Prime Minister of Israel, Ben-Gurion left Mapai and started his own political party called Rafi with Shimon Peres and Moshe Dayan. After Ben-Gurion retired, Peres took over as the leader of Rafi. Category:Political parties in Israel Category:1965 establishments Category:1968 disestablishments
title: Rafi (political party)
